name: Lightless (itch) (Sesa)
description:
Hi, my name is Cesar and this is my first complete videogame!

As a beginner i put a lot of effort and i hope this is the first of many games :)

This is an interesting story of someone who wakes up in an horrible place, and together with the player they both try to figure out what is that place and what have we done to be there. You have to unveil the evil within the house.
